decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of five years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.

Condition : 4 - Further details should be submitted indicating the relationship of the insulation at flat (rear) and sloped (front) profiles, with consideration given to reducing vapour transmitted into the voids in the first instance. Ventilation through the gable end could be considered.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the approved drawing the trough may be additionally lined but the original lining should not be removed. The removed trough should be recorded and retained elsewhere on site for a scheme to be agreed in writing by the local planning authority.
description: Alterations to the second floor including the re-ordering of the existing bedroom, new bathroom and dressing room and works to the existing roof of dwellinghouse (LISTED BUILDING CONSENT)
